title: Gallery Talk: Bauhaus Chicago: Design in the City
title_display: Gallery Talk: Bauhaus Chicago—Design in the City
hero_caption: Edgar Bartolucci, Jack Waldheim. Barwa Lounge Chair, about 1950. Gift of Stanley Tigerman and Margaret McCurry.
short_description: Join curator Alison Fisher to explore the connections between the German Bauhaus school of art and design and the city of Chicago through the exhibition Bauhaus Chicago: Design in the City.
description:
Join curator Alison Fisher to explore the connections between the German Bauhaus school of art and design and the city of Chicago through the exhibition Bauhaus Chicago: Design in the City.

Please note that the artwork on this page may not be featured during the gallery talk.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an email to access@artic.edu two weeks in advance of the program.
